GraphQL Mouse Tracker

This relecting the current state of the graphql database. Each mouse movement will trigger a mutation or "save" to the Prisma GraphQL database. We then subscribe to any CRUD operations to the "position" type. The subscriptions run over a web socket connection. When we get notified of a change, we can re-run the original query which gets the latest "position" in the GraphQL database. We then re-render the output on the screen. This demonstrates unidirectional dataflow without needing a middleman like Redux. And it happens really fast.

[Move your mouse around]
